entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 2:17 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -10.5°C
Wind: SW 12 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then light overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
